update SVC_MNG.TB_COMPANY_INFO
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISVALIDITY = #{isvalidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CTID_EDT !='' and to_date(CTID_EDT, 'yyyy-MM-dd')<to_date(#{corpCredValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')
where CTID_EDT !='' and ( days(to_date(CTID_EDT,'yyyy-MM-dd'))- days(to_date(#{corpCredValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')))>=0 and ( days(to_date(CTID_EDT,'yyyy-MM-dd'))- days(to_date(#{corpCredValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')))<=30
